data.actual_result: Icon is pushed to the right becoming half hidden
data.expected_result: Icon is fully visible even when Enable In-game Overlay is disabled
data.short_description: Toggle Overlay Lock icon in the recording field is half hidden while Enable In-game Overlay is disabled
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into User Settings > Overlay - Disable Enable In-game Overlay if not already disabled - Observe the icon to the right of Toggle Overlay Lock's recording field
